name: FRESH Bot
description: What is the project about? FRESH Bot is a suite of Telegram tools designed to assist traders in navigating the world of low market cap coin trading on the Ethereum blockchain. What makes your project unique? Its primary feature is real-time wallet activity parsing, which monitors specific wallet addresses associated with these coins and provides traders with instant insights into token transfers, buy and sell orders, and liquidity pool activity. This real-time data empowers traders to make informed decisions based on the latest market trends, giving them a competitive edge in the fast-paced cryptocurrency trading environment. History of your project. Released on 7/8/2023 Whatâ€™s next for your project? Incremental release of new bots into our existing suite of technology. What can your token be used for?
